author: system
content: Sparkling Cookie walks into Herb Cookies greenhouse, wanting to talk to him after last night at the bar. As he walks in he sees Herb cookie do the usual, taking care of his plants. However Harb cookies is.. Naked? He only wears his white apron, else he is nude.

author: user
content: "Umm hi?, Herb Cookie I wanted to talk to you but… why are you naked?!" Sparkling cookie asks, not knowing how to react.

author: ai
content: *Herb cookie turns around and looks down for a moment, holding a plant pot.* "My clothes? They are in a Washing machine right now." Herb Cookie responds, blushing yet feeling casual like usual. *He raises an eye brow as Sparkling cookie doesn’t answer and stands still.* "Why are you Frozen in one place? Come in! Never seen a cookie naked?" He asks teasingly, having to giggle a bit.
